Package com.independentid.scim.client

Class ResourceBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.independentid.scim.client.ResourceBuilder
  • public class ResourceBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This builder class is used to construct and manipulate and build ScimResource objects

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • withId

        public ResourceBuilder withId​(java.lang.String identifier)

      • addStringAttribute

        public ResourceBuilder addStringAttribute​(java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.String value)
                                   throws SchemaException
        Adds a String value to the named attribute. Note: if Attribute is multi-valued, the value is added to the set of values, otherwise the existing value is replaced.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the attribute to be added.
        value - A String to be added as a value
        Returns:
        The resource builder.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - is thrown when the attribute could not be located or is of the wrong type.

      • addBooleanAttribute

        public ResourceBuilder addBooleanAttribute​(java.lang.String name,
                                           boolean value)
                                    throws SchemaException
        Adds a Boolean value to the named attribute. Note: if Attribute is multi-valued, the value is added to the set of values, otherwise the existing value is replaced.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of a Boolean Attribute
        value - A boolean used to set its value
        Returns:
        The resource builder.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - is thrown when the attribute could not be located or is of the wrong type.

                                        java.util.Date value)

        Adds a Date value to the named attribute. Note: if Attribute is multi-valued, the value is added to the set of values, otherwise the existing value is replaced.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of a Date Attribute
        value - A Date used to set its value
        Returns:
        The resource builder.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - is thrown when the attribute could not be located or is of the wrong type.

      • addBinaryAttribute

        public ResourceBuilder addBinaryAttribute​(java.lang.String name,
                                          byte[] value)
                                   throws SchemaException
        Adds a Binary value to the named attribute. Note: if Attribute is multi-valued, the value is added to the set of values, otherwise the existing value is replaced.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of a Binary Attribute
        value - An array of bytes (byte[]) used to set its value
        Returns:
        The resource builder.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - is thrown when the attribute could not be located or is of the wrong type.

      • addBinaryAttribute

        public ResourceBuilder addBinaryAttribute​(java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.String b64value)
                                   throws SchemaException
        Adds a Base64 encoded binary value to the named attribute. Note: if Attribute is multi-valued, the value is added to the set of values, otherwise the existing value is replaced.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of a Binary Attribute
        b64value - A String containing a Base64 encoded value used to set its value
        Returns:
        The resource builder.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - is thrown when the attribute could not be located or is of the wrong type.

      • addComplexAttribute

        public ResourceBuilder addComplexAttribute​(ComplexValue val)
                                    throws SchemaException
        If the attribute is MultiValued, the ComplexAttribute will be added to the set of values. Otherwise, the complex value replaces the current value.
        Parameters:
        val - The ComplexValue to be added
        Returns:
        The current builder context
        Throws:
        SchemaException - if values are not compatible

      • addMultiValueAttribute

        public ResourceBuilder addMultiValueAttribute​(MultiValue val)
                                       throws SchemaException
        Adds a MultiValue object to the current resource. Values will be merged if current builder already has values.
        Parameters:
        val - A MultiValue object containing one or more values.
        Returns:
        The current builder context.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - If values cannot be merged

      • removeAttribute

        public ResourceBuilder removeAttribute​(java.lang.String name)
                                throws SchemaException
        emoves all values of a particular attribute type by name
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the attribute. May include the full Schema URN or the simple schema name plus colon and the attribute name (e.g. User:name) to disambiguate names across multiple schemas
        Returns:
        The current builder context.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - If the attribute name cannot be located

      • removeAttribute

        public ResourceBuilder removeAttribute​(Attribute attr)
        Removes values of a particular attribute type
        Parameters:
        attr - The Attribute whose values are to be deleted
        Returns:
        The current builder context.

      • build

        public ScimResource build()
        Completes the build and returns the ScimResource
        Returns:
        The constructed ScimResource

      • buildString

        public java.lang.String buildString()
        Returns:
        Returns the built ScimResource as a JSON String

      • buildHttpEntity

        public org.apache.http.HttpEntity buildHttpEntity()
        Returns:
        A StringEntity containing the constructed SCIM Resource.

      • buildAndCreate

        public ScimResource buildAndCreate​(ScimReqParams params)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   ScimException,
                                   java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                   java.text.ParseException
        This method creates a SCIM Resource using the HTTP POST command. The URI for the request is constructed from the ScimResource.
        Parameters:
        params - Optional SCIM request modifiers (e.g. attributes)
        Returns:
        A ScimResource representation of the result returned by the server.
        Throws:
        ScimException - when an SCIM protocol error occurs
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when an invalid request URL is provided
        java.text.ParseException - when a response is not formatted correctly
        java.io.IOException - due to connection issues

      • buildAndPut

        public ScimResource buildAndPut​(ScimReqParams params)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                ScimException,
                                java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                java.text.ParseException
        This method modifies a SCIM Resource using the HTTP PUT command as per RFC7644. The URI for the request is constructed from the ScimResource.
        Parameters:
        params - Optional SCIM request modifiers (e.g. attributes)
        Returns:
        A ScimResource representation of the result returned by the server.
        Throws:
        ScimException - when an SCIM protocol error occurs
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when an invalid request URL is provided
        java.text.ParseException - when a response is not formatted correctly
        java.io.IOException - due to connection issues

      • getComplexBuilder

        public ComplexValue.Builder getComplexBuilder​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns a builder for ComplexAttribute construction.
        Parameters:
        name - The attribute name of the ComplexValue to be constructed.
        Returns:
        A ComplexValue.Builder is returned
